name: Comet (Edu)
description:
A comet is heading to your planet, the end is inevitable, but can you at least save the world for a little bit?

You're the strong guy with a big gun and need to break the meteorites to get the core and use to charge the canons that'll shot the comet and delay the end of the world for some seconds, but look out! This comet is bringing weird alien life to your planet and they don't seem so friendly.

CONTROLS Keyboard

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move and aim

Z/Space - Jump

X/J - Shoot

R - Restart

Gamepad

Left Stick/D-Pad - Move and Aim

A - Jump

X - Shoot

Made in 2 days for the Ludum Dare 50

Font: Match up pro by @somepx

Song: Aeitia PD Famitracker Chiptune Dump by Spring Spring

Everything else by me: @edusilvart
